title: pls help seniors
content: I’ll be getting CS (core) at PES University, Electronic City campus, through JEE Mains. The fees are around ₹5L per year. Is it worth it in terms of ROI? Also, can PES be considered the 4th best college in Bangalore? How are the placements and the general crowd there? I messed up KCET and don’t have much hope from COMEDK either, so just wondering if this would be my best bet. Also I won’t be taking the hostel so should I book the seat?

comments.body:
Check the FAQs for pros and cons. You'll get your answer. 

>Also, can PES be considered the 4th best college in Bangalore?

4th best? In just Bangalore?? How dare you, we're literally the IIT of Bangalore
It's campus is just like stanford fr
If you can afford it and have no better options ( BITS/NIT/IIIT) then go for it. And yea it's definitely considered in the top 2-3 colleges for CSE in Bangalore and top 5 in Karnataka
